column2: Add unit tests for unindent with selection

column3: This adds two unit tests that reproduces IDEA-223397.
(Sorry I don't know my way around the editor enough to attempt an actual fix for the bug)
Cannot push a test which fails (without a fix for the problem).

@JB-Dmitry Note that I didn't expect you to directly merge it with a failing test. This is a demonstration that the bug really exists and is reproducible, to serve as a starting point for someone knowledgeable to address the issue. Is there a way to annotate the test as being expected to fail until the issue is addressed? (equivalent to Python's http://docs.python.org/dev/library/unittest.html#unittest.expectedFailure)
Add unit tests for unindent with selection
